# Topsis-Gurshaan-Bajwa-102303264

A Python package that implements the TOPSIS (Technique for Order Preference by Similarity to Ideal Solution) method for Multi-Criteria Decision Making (MCDM).

---

## ğŸ“Œ What is TOPSIS?

TOPSIS is a decision-making algorithm used to rank alternatives based on multiple criteria.  
The best alternative is the one that is closest to the ideal solution and farthest from the worst solution.
